column1: #Text=Aang says : " So , this is it huh ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Are you ready for the Fire Nation to know the Avatar is alive ? "
#Text=Toph says : " I hope you kick some serious Fire Lord butt , Twinkle Toes . "
#Text=" Katara says : " We 've been through so many things together , and I 've seen you grow up so much .
#Text=You 're not that little goofy kid I found in the iceberg anymore .
#Text=I guess what I 'm trying to say is , I 'm really proud of you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Everything 's gon na be different after today , is n't it .
#Text=" Aang says : " What if ... what if I do n't come back ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , do n't say that , of course you 'll - " Sokka says : " Katara , what are you doing ?
